title: Actions to induce current in loop near wire

content.prompt:
A small, circular loop of conducting wire is near a long, straight wire that carries a steady electric current I to the right, as shown above. Which of the following actions will result in a clockwise induced electric current in the wire loop?

  1. The wire loop is pulled vertically upward in the plane of the page (away from the wire) at a constant speed.

  2. The current in the straight wire is steadily increasing.

  3. The wire loop is rotated about a diameter through a small angle so that it is no longer in the plane of the page.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
